Reviews.Content: perfectly adequate accepts pets extra fee decent size comfortable beds nice pool couple short blocks shops eateries village overlooking courtyard freeway noise unfortunately courtyard party pretty late moderately disturbing 1100 started hearing 1 dogs 2 barking vigorously hour finally traced door reported desk meantime tenants door home apologized quiet morning desk staff apologetic 50 bill guess wed stay definitely pets

Reviews.Content: wife visited extended stay america located carlsbad california 12 2010 exterior grounds building kept attractive interior offers lots nice amenities nice mini kitchen located nice convenience location short walking distance downtown carlsbad beautiful service hotel noticed downstairs refurbished looks 2nd floor completed near future recommend locations business travelers families excellent value book reservations
